name: Wave Techniques
description: Learn how to create continuous wave illusions through the arms and body.

cards.title: Basic Arm Wave
cards.description: A smooth arm motion that mimics the flow of an energy wave.
bulletpoints: Start with fingers and move through each joint
Use both arms for symmetrical effect

cards.title: Chest Wave
cards.description: A full-body wave starting from the chest and rolling through the spine.
bulletpoints: Engage core muscles to guide movement
Use small shoulder shifts for better transition
Focus on controlled speed for a better illusion
